abstract: Jeffrey Katzenberg, at the National Association of Broadcasters convention, argues that 3-D will be as transformative as color in the history of movies.
snippet: Jeffrey Katzenberg, at the National Association of Broadcasters convention, argues that 3-D will be as transformative as color in the history of movies.
lead_paragraph: Despite the media attention given Jeffrey Katzenberg‘s recent negative comments about the poor-quality 3D conversion of “Clash of the Titans,” the DreamWorks Animation chief executive is convinced that 3-D production is real, and will soon overtake standard 2-D fare in quantity.

headline.main: Katzenberg Talks Up 3-D at Broadcasters Convention
